StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_dbaDetermineWaiverID]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@waiver_category_code char(1), @waiver_type_code char(1), @waiver_level_code char(1)
AS
DECLARE @waiver_category_id int, @waiver_type_id int, @waiver_level_id int
DECLARE Waiver_Cursor CURSOR FOR select wc.waiver_category_id, wt.waiver_type_id, wl.waiver_level_id from waiver_category wc, waiver_type wt, waiver_level wl, waiver_category_type wct where wc.waiver_category_code=@waiver_category_code and wt.waiver_type_code=@waiver_type_code and wl.waiver_level_code=@waiver_level_code and wct.waiver_type_descrip.on=wt.waiver_type_desc and wct.waiver_category_code=wc.waiver_category_code
OPEN Waiver_Cursor
FETCH NEXT FROM Waiver_Cursor INTO @waiver_category_id,@waiver_type_id,@waiver_level_id
select waiver_id from waiver where waiver_category_id=@waiver_category_id and waiver_type_id=@waiver_type_id and waiver_level_id=@waiver_level_id
CLOSE Waiver_Cursor DEALLOCATE Waiver_Cursor
